original_text: And the people of Israel again did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, and the Lord strengthened Eglon the king of Moab against Israel, because they had done what was evil in the sight of the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 또 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하니라 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 목전에 악을 행하므로 여호와께서 모압 왕 에글론을 강성하게 하사 그들을 대적하게 하시매

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel again did what was evil in the sight of the Lord,
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 다시 주의 보시기에 악한 일을 행했고,

sentences.original_text: and the Lord strengthened Eglon the king of Moab against Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 이스라엘을 대적하여 모압 왕 에글론을 강하게 하시니,

sentences.original_text: because they had done what was evil in the sight of the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 주의 보시기에 악을 행하였음이더라.
